name: Notice.AAA6.GeneralApps.HwF.PartRemission.Applicant
titleEn: Your help with fees application has been reviewed
titleCy: Mae eich cais am help i dalu ffioedd wedi cael ei adolygu
descriptionEn:
You’ll get help with the ${applicationFeeTypeEn} fee. ${remissionAmount} will be covered by fee remission.

To progress your application, you must still pay the remaining fee of ${outstandingFeeInPounds}.

You can pay by phone by calling {civilMoneyClaimsTelephone}.
descriptionCy:
Byddwch yn cael help gyda’r ffi ${applicationFeeTypeCy}. Bydd ${remissionAmount} o’r ffi yn cael ei ddileu.

I symud eich cais yn ei flaen, rhaid i chi dalu’r ffi sy’n weddill sef ${outstandingFeeInPounds}.

Gallwch dalu dros y ffôn drwy ffonio {civilMoneyClaimsTelephone}.
